WebLink.description: ACTIVE. This button is used on the opportunity layouts to send DocuSign requests for Purchase Agreements.
WebLink.url: {!URLFOR('/apex/dsfs__DocuSign_CreateEnvelope', null, [SourceID = Opportunity.Id, RC='',RSL='',RSRO='',RROS='',CCRM='',CCTM='',CRCL='',CRL="LoadDefaultContacts~1"+ ",Email~" + User.Email + ";FirstName~" + User.FirstName +";LastName~" + User.LastName+";RoutingOrder~4"+";Role~Signer 2", DST='',CCNM='',LA='0',LF='0',CEM='',CES='[FirstName] [LastName] ([Email]) has sent you a DocuSign Signature request',SRS='',STB='',SSB='',SES='',SEM='',SRS='',SCS='',RES='' ])}
